thread.title: Taiwan's Hon Hai offers to buy Sharp's LCD business, wants Apple funds - Nikkei
thread.title_full: Taiwan's Hon Hai offers to buy Sharp's LCD business, wants Apple funds - Nikkei - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Taiwan's Hon Hai offers to buy Sharp's LCD business, wants Apple funds - Nikkei
text: TOKYO (Reuters) - Taiwan's Hon Hai Precision Industry Co offered to buy Sharp Corp's struggling liquid panel display business and plans to seek funding from Apple Inc, the Nikkei business daily reported on Monday. Â»
